alert.note: Alert for Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 7:04PM CDT until May 13 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL STEPHENS COUNTY... At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Breckenridge, and is nearly stationary. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR BRECKENRIDGE. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Necessity and Crystal Falls. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
